import React from "react" import Thumbnail from "../Thumbnail" import { Container, Row, Col } from "../Grid" import "./style.css" import SaveBtn from "../SaveButton" import API from "../../utils/API" export function BookList({ children }) { return
    {children}
} export function BookListItem({ id, key, image = "https://placehold.it/100x100", title, description, authors, link, date }) { const loadBooks = (res) => { console.log("Load Book", res) } const handleFormSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() API.saveBook({ id: id, key: key, title: title, description: description, link: link, authors: authors[0], image: image, date: date }) .then(res => loadBooks(res)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return(

  • {title}

    Description: {description}

    Author: {authors}

    Here's the Link!

    Date: {date}
    • ) }
